name: Hecate Ritual Robe. Handmade to order
description:
You are looking at our beautiful Hecate style ritual robe. Made in a light weight cotton fabric, and featuring a delicate crochet trim. 

Dress size: 8 – 26 (please see our size chart below and specify when ordering)
Dress colour: Black (please e-mail us for details if you require a different colour)
Trimming: Black

All of our Garments are 100% Cotton, in some cases exclusive of trim. However we do try to keep them as natural as possible.

The lightness of the cotton fabric makes this robe easy to wear and perfect for ritual work. The sleeve design allows fabric to drop to a long, elegant point. Our robes are great for coven working, handfastings, and other pagan/wiccan rituals. All of our ritual robes are made to order giving them a distinctly personal touch. Production generally takes about 3 weeks; however, we find that most people prefer such garments made this way. We will, of course, e-mail you to let you know when your robe has been dispatched.

Metric sizes, for modern folks
Size	8	10	12	14	16	18
Bust	80	83	87	92	97	102
Waist	61	64	67	71	76	81
Hips	85	88	92	97	102	107

Size		20	22	24	26	
Bust		107	112	117	122	
Waist		87	94	99	104	
Hips		112	117	122	127	

Imperial sizes, for those who prefer the old ways
Size	8	10	12	14	16	18
Bust	31 1/2	32 1/2	34	36	38	40
Waist	24	25	26 1/2	28	30	32
Hips	33 1/2	34 1/2	36	38	40	42

Size		20	22	24	26
Bust		42	44	46	48
Waist		34	37	39	41
Hips		44	46	48	50

Please ask a friend to measure you rather than trying to do it yourself. You will obtain a much more accurate fit if you have someone to help take measurements for you.

These robes are extremely comfortable and easy to wear, and care for.
	
Be planet kind wash inside out at 30ºC. Do not tumble dry. Do not dry clean. Hang whilst damp.
We can not guarantee that items are colourfast.

We are happy to ship worldwide
Postage and packing to:
UK – Recorded, signed for, delivery within 1-2 working days £4.00
Europe – International signed for (tracked within uk) 3-4 working days £10.00
USA – International signed for (tracked within uk) 5-6 working days £14.00
These listings are in GBP

In the unlikely event that you are not happy with any of our items, please e-mail us on receipt of your order so we can solve the problem.
If for any reason you do not receive your item within the maximum specified delivery time, after you have received your dispatch e-mail, please contact us immediately so we can track your order. 
If you have any queries please don’t hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for looking.

name: Medieval style dress. Handmade to order
description:
You are looking at our beautiful medieval Marian style dress. Made in a light weight cotton fabric, and featuring a delicate crochet trim.

Dress size: 8-26 (please see our size chart below and specify when ordering)
Dress colour: Pictured here in moss green, also available in; white, cream, navy, lavender, red, deep red, earth brown, woodland pink, forest green, and orange. Now available in dark green too! (please specify when ordering)
Trimming: black or cream (please specify when ordering)

All of our Garments are 100% Cotton, in some cases exclusive of trim. However we do try to keep them as natural as possible.

The lightness of the cotton fabric makes this dress easy to wear and perfect for any time of year. The sleeve design allows fabric to drop to a long, elegant point. Our dresses are great for festivals, handfastings, and other pagan/wiccan rituals, wonderful for use as a quality comfortable fancy dress costume, or for use on the stage. Alternatively just as part of your everyday wardrobe. 
All of our garments are made to order giving them a distinctly personal touch. Production generally takes about 3 weeks; however, we find that most people prefer these garments made this way. We will, of course, e-mail you to let you know when your order has been dispatched.

name: Guinevere style dress. Handmade to order
description:
You are looking at our stunning Guinevere style dress. Made in a light weight cotton fabric with a delicate crochet and ribbon trim. 

Dress size: (please see our size chart below and specify when ordering)
Dress colour: Pictured here in teal, also available in; white, cream, pale blue, turquoise, navy, purple, lavender, moss green, forest green and red. Now available in dark green too! (please specify when ordering)
Trim colour: black or cream (please specify when ordering)

All of our Garments are 100% Cotton, in some cases exclusive of trim. However we do try to keep them as natural as possible.

The lightness of the cotton fabric makes this dress easy to wear and perfect for any time of year. The sleeve design allows fabric to drop to a long, elegant point, and the lace shoulder straps look stunning with the off shoulder collar. Our dresses are great for festivals, handfastings, and other pagan/wiccan rituals, wonderful for use as a quality comfortable fancy dress costume, or for use on the stage. Alternatively just as part of your everyday wardrobe.
All of our garments are made to order giving them a distinctly personal touch. Production generally takes about 3 weeks; however, we find that most people prefer these garments made this way. We will, of course, e-mail you to let you know when your order has been dispatched.
